title: hour Christmas dinner
description: This easy turkey crown recipe is served with shortcut sides to make your life so much easier. You will need to buy some ready-made cheats, but the payoff is that the whole delicious dinner is done in less than 2 hours!
ingredients: 1 x 120g pack mixed nuts and dried fruit (I use one containing brazil nuts, pecans, almonds, sultanas and dried cranberries)
1 small bunch fresh thyme, finely chopped
1 large unwaxed lemon, finely grated zest only
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1.2kg/2lb 12oz potatoes, preferably Maris Piper or King Edward, peeled and cut into large chunks
4 tbsp sunflower oil or melted goose fat
2 rashers smoked streaky or back bacon, roughly chopped
4 tbsp ruby port or red wine
2 tbsp orange juice (fresh or from a carton)
2 tbsp chopped frozen parsley or 3 tbsp freshly chopped parsley
4 rashers rindless smoked streaky bacon, cut into 2cm/¾in pieces
200g/7oz cooked and peeled chestnuts, vacuum-packed or frozen and thawed, halved
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
